name: SelectMenuItemsByMealId
value: SELECT menuitems.id, name, description, price, ismeal FROM restaurantchain.mealsdishes inner join restaurantchain.menuitems ON menuitems.id = mealsdishes.dishid where mealid = @mealid;

name: UpdateMenuItem
value: UPDATE restaurantchain.menuitems SET Price = @price WHERE id = @id

name: InsertOrderItem
value: INSERT INTO restaurantchain.orderitems(id, orderid, menuitemid, amount, value)VALUES (@id, @orderid, @menuitemid, @amount, @value);

name: UpdateOrder
value: UPDATE restaurantchain.orders SET  total=@total, status=@status	WHERE id = @id;

name: UpdateOrderItem
value: UPDATE restaurantchain.orderitems SET orderid=@orderid, menuitemid=@menuitemid, amount=@amount, value=@value WHERE id = @id;

name: ExistsOrder
value: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM restaurantchain.orders WHERE id = @id);
